code: @BeforeClass public static void before() {     final WordpressServiceProvider serviceProvider = WordpressServiceProvider.getInstance().     serviceProvider.init(WordpressTestConstants.WORDPRESS_DEMO_URL).     serviceTaxonomy = serviceProvider.getService(WordpressServiceTaxonomy.class). }

@Test public void testRetrieve() {     final Taxonomy taxonomy = serviceTaxonomy.retrieve(null, "category").     assertThat(taxonomy, not(nullValue())).     assertThat(taxonomy.getName(), not(isEmptyOrNullString())). }
@Test public void testList() {     final Map<String, Taxonomy> taxs = serviceTaxonomy.list(null, null).     assertThat(taxs, is(not(nullValue()))).     assertThat(taxs.size(), is(2)). }
